body.name: Aureday 60" Phone Tripod Stand, All in One Tripod for iPhone and Android Cell Phone, Portable Tripod Stand with Remote for Video Recording/Selfie/Vlogging/Live Streaming
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 19 hrs 10 mins
features: 3 in One Phone Holder: Aureday phone stand uses an innovative idea, integration with the phone tripod, table stand and selfie stick together, which deserves to be called an intellective cellphone gadget. This cellphone tripod is very versatile and sturdy, that makes it great for multi-usage especially outdoors. You can take your own pictures without the extra frustration of someone else messing up. Glad tidings for all photography lovers!

High-quality Telescoping Pole: Adoption of high-quality aluminum alloy material and process, which makes the selfie stick tripod sturdy and sleek. The solid pole is made up of 6 sections. Easily folds down to the size of a compact flashlight (33.4cm/13in) and fully extends up to 60in (5 feet). Multiple choices of the length allow you to capture various wonderful shots in front of the most beautiful backgrounds.

Multi-scene Usages: The freedom of being included in the family, group or solo picture, which makes tripod stand a necessity for everybody expecting to have the best memories of their life. 90° vertical and 360° horizontal rotation phone clip head is very secure and swivels easily to do vertical or portrait shots. It easily expands and supports all mobile phones in width(4"-7") well. Super convenient for selfies, exploration, solo travel, TikTok, live stream, ect.

Rechargeable Wireless Remote: Built-in cliker is easily removable and powered by charging cable via type-c micro port. Only a few steps, quickly and smoothly pairing to your smartphone, fastly responsive as needed. The detachable remote is so small that it's quite easy to hide while you are posing. You are instantly able to snap pictures with just a click of the button!

Friendly User Design: To ensure better stability, the tripod feet and phone clamp are covered with anti-slip silicone pads. Aluminum alloy pole is pretty strong and anti-corrosion, nicely contractile to fit for any backpack. Exquisite appearance and superb workmanship, which is worthy of a perfect gift for content creators, families, friends, blogger, ect.
body.description: Aureday Selfie Stick Tripod X60 Specification Aureday 60" phone tripod stand functions as both a handheld selfie stick and a foldable mobile phone tripod. In order to constantly capture your best self on camera, the selfie stick tripod with remote sports a compact design that fits effortlessly into a backpack. Product wight: 340g/0.75lb Product size: 5.50×5.50×33.50cm Material: aluminum alloy, ABS, PC Maximum length: 60in/152cm

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy compact and useful 3 in 1 go for it!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a compact selfie stick to take photos/videos while traveling. This selfie sticks collapses to a portable size that I was able to easily fit into my backpack and carry on the plane with no issues. It expands to a great height that makes photos and video almost at eye level. When extended fully. The included Bluetooth remote was easy to pair with the phone. The mount grips my phone securely and is able to turn either vertically or horizontally. I don’t think you can take off or change the phone mount. I wish there was an adapter to mount other tripod heads. While the tripod base is made of plastic, it appears solid. For the price, I would definitely recommend this selfie stick as it makes it easy to take solo or group pictures. it works great for me to take pictures and videos of my child and me. It’s easy compact and very useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent phone tripod stand
reviews.reviewText: I think this is one of the best tripod stands and a selfie stick. More of a tripod stand than a selfie stick. It’s a little heavy and solid so might not be a big plus to carry on a flight. The design is very good and is worth a try. Very easy to assemble and also comes with a small Bluetooth remote which I felt as a best option. The package was little delayed but was worth the wait.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent customer service
reviews.reviewText: The remote stopped functioning recently. I contacted the mfg. and asked for a replacement. They stood behind their product and shipped a new remote immediately. I received it in just a few days. This kind of customer service, professionalism and courtesy is hard to find. Thank you Aureday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent tripod - selfie stick combo
reviews.reviewText: It is more compact than real tripods, you can easy slide it in a backpack, but still more offer more functionality compared to some other smaller desk-type tripods.This is extremely useful when you are wanting to film or take pictures of yourself and you do not have anyone around to help you out. I can take full body pictures or video standing, thanks to 60" extension capability and little Bluetooth remote. It is like your own personal assistant which is extremely useful.Work well as regular selfie stick too, in a handheld option. When fully extended could be heavy for female hands, though.I love this tripod/stick. It works great, good quality. Easy to set up with Bluetooth, easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Horrible quality and broke after two weeks
reviews.reviewText: Piece of crap. It can barely stand up and the mechanism is just so annoying to work with. I don't even have a large model phone and I can barely fit my phone in the holder. I can't believe how hard it is to find a good tripod

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall very easy to use and incredibly portable
reviews.reviewText: This tripod is one of my favorites because it's not only sleek but also very practical. A lot of other tripods feature a very poke-y and rugged exterior making them difficult to bring around but this tripod is very smooth and small which makes it very portable!The first time I used it I will admit I struggled trying to get the "legs" to come off but turns out I wasn't applying enough pull force to get the legs to detach from the main body. Don't be afraid to use some force when using it the first few times. The product is quite sturdy and I'm guessing it's intentionally built this way so that it doesn't open while you're traveling about with them.The only thing that's stopping me from giving this product a full 5 stars is the remote control holder. The remote itself is great but the spot to store the remote control is very unreliable. The remote doesn't snap in very well into the holder spot and as a result the remote control often falls out when I'm traveling with the tripod. As such, I no longer bring the remote around with me anymore because I'm afraid it'll fall out and I'll lose it.Overall great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this tripod I’ve tried others in the past and never liked them. This one is perfect as it extends out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Trouble getting head to turn sideways
reviews.reviewText: For the price, a great deal. Haven't field tested it yet. But did have 30 seconds of trouble with the legs - just pull out on the bottom. And, did have 5 minutes of trouble getting the head to rotate - it is easy if the top is pulled out.
